title: AMA - SG

replies.body:

replies.body: Its about to be my one month anniversary that I'm banned so question after that is is possible that i can still get unbanned
replies.body_tagged: Its about to be my one month anniversary that I'm banned so question after that is is possible that i can still get unbanned

replies.body: Do you like carrots? or potatoes? or jokes? want to hear one? is this too many questions? How old r u? r u brokr?!?!?!1/1/1/1/1!??!?1eleven?!1
replies.body_tagged: Do you like carrots? or potatoes? or jokes? want to hear one? is this too many questions? How old r u? r u brokr?!?!?!1/1/1/1/1!??!?1eleven?!1

replies.body:
Indeed, you still have a chance at being unbanned. However, you need to send an appeal to support@avicus.net. If you don't get a response within 1 week, resend it.

 If you make forums posts relating to your ban, it will be harder to appeal your ban. Try and keep these topics off the Avicus Website. If you need further information about this, contact a Staff Memeber on Skype. Good luck!
replies.body_tagged:
Indeed, you still have a chance at being unbanned. However, you need to send an appeal to support@avicus.net. If you don't get a response within 1 week, resend it.

 If you make forums posts relating to your ban, it will be harder to appeal your ban. Try and keep these topics off the Avicus Website. If you need further information about this, contact a Staff Memeber on Skype. Good luck!

replies.body:
You still have a chance at being unbanned, though making forum posts about it lowers your chances. Email support@avicus.net or contact a Sr. Mod or above on Skype.

EDIT: Ninja'd ^^^^
